content:
## MARKET OVERVIEW

1. What is the Current Market Regime?
Risk‑On: Low volatility (Vol: 14.1%) with full participation (Breadth: 8/8 sectors positive).

2. Which sectors are leading?
Banking & Finance and Holding & Investment are leading: YKBNK (1W: +8.70% | 1M: +8.95%) ABOVE TREND, SAHOL (1W: +7.92% | 1M: +9.68%) ABOVE TREND.

3. Which sectors are lagging?
Technology & Telecom and Construction are the softest of gainers but still positive: KONTR (1W: -0.79% | 1M: -27.57%) BELOW TREND, ALARK (1W: +0.00% | 1M: +9.92%) NEUTRAL.

## STOCK PERFORMANCE

4. Top Performing Stocks?
YKBNK (1W: +8.70% | 1M: +8.95%) ABOVE TREND; HALKB (1W: +8.28% | 1M: +3.63%) ABOVE TREND; VAKBN (1W: +8.21% | 1M: +4.34%) ABOVE TREND; SAHOL (1W: +7.92% | 1M: +9.68%) ABOVE TREND; TOASO (1W: +7.25% | 1M: +17.24%) ABOVE TREND.

5. Worst Performing Stocks?
AEFES (1W: +0.12% | 1M: +3.39%) ABOVE TREND; GUBRF (1W: +0.07% | 1M: +18.63%) ABOVE TREND; ALARK (1W: +0.00% | 1M: +9.92%) NEUTRAL; VESTL (1W: -0.27% | 1M: -8.08%) BELOW TREND; ARCLK (1W: -0.28% | 1M: +2.39%) CORRECTION.

6. Momentum Stocks?
YKBNK (1W: +8.70% | 1M: +8.95%) ABOVE TREND; HALKB (1W: +8.28% | 1M: +3.63%) ABOVE TREND; VAKBN (1W: +8.21% | 1M: +4.34%) ABOVE TREND; TOASO (1W: +7.25% | 1M: +17.24%) ABOVE TREND; TAVHL (1W: +6.50% | 1M: +9.39%) ABOVE TREND.

## SECTOR OUTLOOK

7. Banking Sector Outlook?
Banking is the market engine; AKBNK (1W: +5.70% | 1M: +13.66%) ABOVE TREND, GARAN (1W: +6.38% | 1M: +7.93%) ABOVE TREND, ISCTR (1W: +6.36% | 1M: +5.34%) ABOVE TREND, YKBNK (1W: +8.70% | 1M: +8.95%) ABOVE TREND are all leading—overweight cyclicals.

8. Industrial Sector Outlook?
Heavy industry mixed but constructive: TOASO (1W: +7.25% | 1M: +17.24%) ABOVE TREND, ASELS (1W: +6.15% | 1M: +29.66%) ABOVE TREND, EREGL (1W: +2.85% | 1M: +3.11%) ABOVE TREND; VESTL (1W: -0.27% | 1M: -8.08%) BELOW TREND is the key laggard.

9. Energy & Chemicals Outlook?
Energy modestly positive with select strength: TUPRS (1W: +4.21% | 1M: -2.08%) RECOVERY, GUBRF (1W: +0.07% | 1M: +18.63%) ABOVE TREND, TRALT (1W: -0.77% | 1M: +11.76%) CORRECTION.

## PORTFOLIO STRATEGY

10. Portfolio Recommendation?
Bias higher-risk: overweight banks, auto/industrials, and large holdings; trim structurally weak tech and underperforming small cyclicals; use strength to add on pullbacks, keep stop discipline.

## NEXT WEEK OUTLOOK

11. Stocks to Watch Next Week?
YKBNK (1W: +8.70% | 1M: +8.95%) ABOVE TREND; TOASO (1W: +7.25% | 1M: +17.24%) ABOVE TREND; ASELS (1W: +6.15% | 1M: +29.66%) ABOVE TREND; GUBRF (1W: +0.07% | 1M: +18.63%) ABOVE TREND.

12. Sectors to Watch Next Week?
Banking & Finance for leadership continuation; Heavy Industry/Auto for earnings and momentum; Holding & Investment for flow into large-cap conglomerates.

13. Key Levels & Triggers?
Monitor XU100 for hold above the 20‑day moving average as confirmation of the risk‑on trend and a clean breakout above the recent swing high for extension; catalysts: CBRT commentary, global risk sentiment, Q4 earnings across banks and industrials.

EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
Low volatility and unanimous sector gains set a Risk‑On tape; banks and large holdings are the obvious leaders with autos and defense names providing momentum. Key risk is any global risk shock that flips sentiment—keep stops and favor high‑quality cyclicals on dips.
